title: San Lorenzo
description: I developed a website for the San Lorenzo football club, where I was responsible for the user experience (UX), design, and implementation. I ensured that the interface was intuitive and visually appealing, providing an optimal experience for users while representing the club's identity in an impactful way.

title: Best Day
description:
Best Day is an online platform dedicated to booking travel services. I was responsible for the design and development of the Best Day website. 
My role included creating a user-friendly interface and implementing the necessary functionality to ensure a seamless user experience, from browsing travel options to completing bookings.

title: HICX Solutions
description: HICX supplier management solutions help some of the largest companies in the world to build productive working relationships with all their suppliers.
